name: Sales Management Dashboard
description:
Hello Friends!!

Making data-driven decisions is one way to increase the profitability of your company. Sales dashboards can provide valuable information to business owners about profits, customers, and team productivity. Meet our new sales dashboard concept!


This dashboard shows a graph that shows the success of online and offline sales, as well as statistics that show the total number of earnings and customer activity. There is also a list of top-selling products.


The vibrant accent colors make it simple to analyse the statistics. This concept's entire information is divided into blocks, making dashboard data easier to perceive and navigate.
